speaker: Agent
text: Hello and thank you for contacting General Corporation. Before we start may I have your first and last name?

speaker: Client
text: David Firth

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you David. How may I help you today?

speaker: Client
text: I'm trying to pay my bill but it's not working.

speaker: Agent
text: Ok I can help you with that. Are you trying to pay with a bank draft or a credit card?

speaker: Client
text: I'm paying with my debit card.

speaker: Agent
text: What amount are you trying to play?

speaker: Agent
text: What is the name of the bank for your debit card?

speaker: Client
text: Wells Fargo

speaker: Agent
text: Can you please confirm the debit card number for me please?

speaker: Agent
text: and the expiration?

speaker: Agent
text: And the CV code?

speaker: Client
text: What is that?

speaker: Agent
text: It's a three digit number usually on the back of your debit card next to the signature strip.

speaker: Client
text: Oh ok. It's 412

speaker: Agent
text: Do I have your authorization to run your debit card in the amount of five hundred dollars and fourty three cents?

speaker: Client
text: Yes.

speaker: Agent
text: Ok one moment please while I run your debit card.

speaker: Client
text: Ok

speaker: Agent
text: The system is telling me that it needs your physical address associated with the card.

speaker: Client
text: Ok. It's 413 main street in Deluth GA. The zip is 55812.

speaker: Agent
text: I also need a phone number associated with the account.

speaker: Client
text: It’s probably my cell phone. That's 218-730-4300

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. I will try running the transaction again.

speaker: Client
text: Ok thanks.

speaker: Agent
text: The payment was successful. You should get an email confirmation that a payment in the amount of $500.43 was made on August 11th at 11:59 AM. Is there anything else I can help you with?

speaker: Client
text: Nope that's it.
